releases.title: Enhanced Voice Processing and Calendar Integration
releases.body:
### Features
- Enhanced voice transcription accuracy with improved AI models
- Better calendar integration with popular calendar applications
- New privacy controls for data management
- Performance optimizations for faster processing

### Bug Fixes
- Fixed audio processing issues on certain hardware configurations
- Resolved calendar sync problems with Google Calendar
- Improved error handling and user feedback

### Technical Improvements
- Updated core dependencies to latest versions
- Enhanced security measures for data protection
- Better cross-platform compatibility
- Improved memory usage and performance

releases.title: Bug Fixes and Stability Improvements
releases.body:
### Bug Fixes
- Fixed crash when processing very long audio files
- Resolved UI freezing issues during transcription
- Fixed calendar event creation with special characters

### Improvements
- Better error messages for troubleshooting
- Improved audio quality detection
- Enhanced logging for debugging

releases.title: Multi-language Support and UI Improvements
releases.body:
### Features
- Added support for multiple languages in transcription
- New modern UI with improved accessibility
- Enhanced keyboard shortcuts and navigation
- Better integration with system notifications

### Technical Changes
- Migrated to new audio processing engine
- Improved database performance
- Better error recovery mechanisms
